data: Alumni Make A Gift Make A Gift Join us in shaping the future of Centre College Every gift to Centre College strengthens our community, enriches student opportunities, and ensures our continued excellence. Whether you prefer to give annually, establish a legacy, or explore unique giving options, there’s a way to give that’s right for you. Discover how you can make a difference below. Give Now Planned Giving Endowments Centre Fund Gifts to the Centre Fund provide vital flexibility, allowing the College to address student and institutional needs as they arise. Comprising about three-fourths of annual gifts, these contributions bridge the gap between the cost of tuition and the true expense of delivering the Centre Experience. Give to the Centre Fund Scholarships Ninety percent of Centre students receive financial aid, making the Centre Experience accessible to all. Unrestricted gifts and strong support for scholarships are essential to maintaining affordability and providing opportunities for students of all backgrounds. Give to Scholarships Experiential Learning A Centre education empowers students to be global change-makers. Courses take place inside and outside of the classroom, on and off campus—even abroad, and allow students to get credit for hands-on learning with options like internships, community-based learning, faculty-mentored research, and active participation in the arts. Donor support is essential to fulfilling this promise. Give to Experiential Learning Campus & Community Annual gifts that support community-building areas—such as diversity, environmental initiatives, the arts, and campus organizations—ensure Centre remains a welcoming home for all students. Give to the Centre Community Athletics Centre offers an exceptional education while promoting well-rounded student lives. Over 40% of students can pursue athletics in NCAA Division III without sacrificing academics. Thanks to alumni support, Centre's top-tier athletic and fitness facilities benefit students, faculty, and staff alike. Give to Athletics Not finding what you're looking for? Head over to our Make A Gift page and search through the designations available, or contact Kelly Knetsche , Vice President for Development & Alumni Engagement. Your gift makes a difference, your way. Ways to Give Give by Venmo or PayPal Gifts can be made via Venmo (@Centre-Alumni) or PayPal ( gifts-paypal@centre.edu ). Give by Mail Simply make your check payable to Centre College and send to: Office of Development Centre College 600 West Walnut Street Danville, KY 40422 Please fill out and include this printable gift form with your check or credit card information. You can also email the form to Lori Burke . Give by Phone Please call our office at 859.238.5500 Monday through Friday from 8:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. to make your gift by credit card. Give by Electronic Funds Transfer (EFT) Make your gift to Centre without ever writing a check through an Electronic Funds Transfer, spreading the cost of your support over the course of a year. Centre EFT is safe, secure, and you'll know when your account will be debited. You can choose to use your credit card, or checking or savings account. Withdrawals are made on or around the 4th of each month and can be skipped at any time. Please fill out and include this printable gift form with your check, or email the form to Lori Burke . Give by Stock Transfer For stock held by a broker Reference DTC#: 0756 Account Name: Centre College of Kentucky Account number: 4828-5844-6-133 Contact: The Snyder Financial Group Ameriprise Financial Services, Inc. 805 N. Whittington Pkwy Ste 100H Louisville, KY 40222 Office: 502.394.3950 *Please ask your broker to attach your name to the transfer so we can track it back to you when it comes to our account. For stock certificates held by you Send unsigned certificates by certified mail. Sign but do not complete a stock power form for each security, have your signature guaranteed with the Medallion guarantee stamp, and send separate from the certificates to: Office of Development Centre College 600 West Walnut Street Danville, KY, 40422 If you have any questions concerning your stock transfer, please contact Jamey Leahey at 859.238.5224 or jamey.leahey@centre.edu . Give with a Gift-in-Kind Non-monetary gifts such as books, artwork, or other tangible items bring great value to Centre. For more information, please contact Jamey Leahey at 859.238.5224 or jamey.leahey@centre.edu . Give with a Planned Gift Centre College has long received generous financial support from alumni and friends. Most often these gifts are made outright to Centre, thereby providing the entire amount up front. Centre also receives what are known as deferred gifts, in which the donor has deferred Centre's receipt of the full value of the gift, or where the donor has reserved some benefit from the amount given. Deferred giving not only offers tremendous benefits to Centre, but can also help you enjoy tax and income advantages, particularly for gift plans that involve a transfer of assets during your lifetime, such as to a trust or life-income plan. Our Office of Gift Planning will work with you and your financial advisors to create a plan that works for you. For more information, please contact Jamey Leahey at 859.238.5224 or jamey.leahey@centre.edu . Give by Payroll Deduction (Centre employees only) Faculty and staff members play a vital role in the life of the College. If you are interested in also supporting the College financially, please download our payroll deduction form and send it to the Office of Developmen t by campus mail or email the completed form to Lori Burke . Double Your Impact Did you know that you can double your gifts to Centre through our matching donation program? Many employers sponsor matching gift programs to match charitable contributions made by their employees. Simply type your company name into the search below to find out if they will match your gift to Centre!
